actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

official_title: To congratulate the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League on winning its first National Football Conference (NFC) Central Division title in 23 years and to commend Quarterback Brett Favre for being recognized as the National Football League's Most Valuable Player.

summary.text: Congratulates the Green Bay Packers on winning the 1995 National Football Conference Central Division championship. Commends Brett Favre for his performance as quarterback. Recognizes the team's commitment to athletic excellence.

titles.title: To congratulate the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League on winning its first National Football Conference (NFC) Central Division title in 23 years and to commend Quarterback Brett Favre for being recognized as the National Football League's Most Valuable Player.
